value.title: AI Has Eaten IBM Think
value.excerpt: AI pervades every session at the annual IBM event. The virtual event of “All Things IBM” has become “All Things AI”, from chips to software, Watson to SAP, and companies including SalesForce, Siemens,

value.title: Edge AI chipset developer Sima.ai raises $80M
value.excerpt: Sima.ai, a startup developing an edge AI accelerator chipset, has secured $80 million in venture capital backing.

value.title: Mythic raises $70M to disrupt AI chips with analog and flash components
value.excerpt: Mythic has raised $70 million to fund the analog-based AI processors it plans to launch later this year. Mythic has spent nine years coming up with a patented, potentially disruptive way to compete with other makers of artificial intelligence chips.

value.title: Full interview with IBM CEO Arvind Krishna on new AI innovations, chip shortage, strategy and more
value.excerpt: IBM will announce advancements in artificial intelligence and quantum computing at its global annual conference called "Think." The technology is designed to help businesses push further into the 21st century.

value.title: XCO and Atlazo Announce Joint Venture to Commercialize Virtual Healthcare Products Leveraging Edge AI System-on-Chip Technology

value.title: AI and nanotechnology could make cancer cell therapy affordable for all
value.excerpt: There is, however, hope. The most recent insights in nanotechnology, artificial intelligence (AI), biosensors, and the Internet of Things could help overcome the current roadblocks in making personalized cell therapies affordable. The solution to ...

value.title: Pushing Computing to the Edge With Innovative Microchip Design to Make AI Accessible in Real-Time
value.excerpt: Responding to artificial intelligence’s exploding demands on computer networks, Princeton University researchers in recent years have radically increased the speed and slashed the energy use of specialized AI systems.

value.title: U.S. Senate committee revised a draft bill to fund AI, quantum, biotech
value.excerpt: The U.S. Senate will consider a revised technology research bill to invest $95 billion in AI, semiconductors, quantum computing, and biotech.

value.title: AI Weekly: Qualcomm’s AI research and development efforts
value.excerpt: Qualcomm AI research head Jilei Hou spoke with VentureBeat about the company's investment focus and broader mission.

value.title: Samsung develops an innovative I-Cube4 chip packaging technology: Faster & Efficient
value.excerpt: Amidst the global chip shortage, leading chipmaker Samsung has announced a new chip packaging technology. Potentially, the new technology could yield more efficient and faster chips using an innovative chip-packing technique.

value.title: IBM Sets Another Smallness Record with 2nm Chip Blueprints
value.excerpt: IBM said the new chip is designed to achieve 45 percent higher performance and 75 percent lower energy use than today’s most advanced 7nm node chips.

value.title: How the USPS uses Nvidia GPUs and A.I. to track missing mail
value.excerpt: You've got mail! But where is it? The USPS is leaning on A.I. at the edge and GPU-accelerated computing to help track and locate missing mail and packages.

value.title: Lightmatter’s photonic AI ambitions light up an $80M B round
value.excerpt: AI is fundamental to many products and services today, but its hunger for data and computing cycles is bottomless. Lightmatter plans to leapfrog Moore’s law with its ultra-fast photonic chips specialized for AI work,

value.title: The Global Chip Shortage Won’t Ease Soon
value.excerpt: The world is suffering from a systemic shortage of chips. What is causing these shortages, and when will it improve? Answers to those questions are included here.

value.title: Tesla, Apple Supplier Delta To Pour $7M In AI Semiconductor Startup Amid Chip Shortage
value.excerpt: Tesla Inc (NASDAQ: TSLA) and Apple Inc (NASDAQ: AAPL) power components supplier Delta Electronics is backing Kneron, an artificial intelligence startup that

value.title: Tesla supplier Delta Electronics invests $7M in AI chip startup Kneron
value.excerpt: Despite a persistent semiconductor shortage that is disrupting the global automotive industry, investors remain bullish on the chips used to power next-generation vehicles. Kneron, a startup that develops semiconductors to give devices artificial intelligence capabilities by using edge computing,

value.title: Carnegie Mellon researchers trained AI to simulate our universe on a GPU
value.excerpt: Simulating the universe is difficult. There are, after all, potentially infinite variables to consider. Scientists typically use supercomputers to crunch data at the cosmological level, but a team of

value.title: U.S. chip startups, long shunned in favor of internet bets, stir excitement again
value.excerpt: Silicon Valley venture capitalists, long focused on software and internet companies, are again pouring money into the semiconductor industry, lured by the promise of a new generation of artificial-intelligence chips that could challenge incumbents like Intel Corp and

value.title: 10 Business Models That Reimagine The Value Creation Of AI And ML
value.excerpt: Every day we read about some new AI breakthrough. AI is omnipresent in our everyday lives whether we use mobile devices, wearables or voice assistants or stream our favorite shows. Enterprises control the epicenter of the AI economy,

value.title: Esperanto Technologies Adopts Movellus Maestro AI, Intelligent Clock Networks for Its ET-SoC-1 Chip
value.excerpt: Esperanto Technologies has adopted Movellus' Maestro AI intelligent clocking solution for its ET-SoC-1 chips. Esperanto develops high-performance, energy-efficient computing solutions based on RISC-V for Artificial Intelligence (AI),

value.title: IBM details planned 2-nanometer chip process
value.excerpt: During a press conference, IBM detailed its 2-nanometer chip process, which it expects will come into production in the next several years.

value.title: How the AI Chips Market will be Valued at $129 billion by 2025
value.excerpt: The AI chips market that is leveraging the data centres run by cloud providers is going to be estimated to grow to $129 billion in 2025. Here’s how industries will benefit from it.

value.title: Nvidia RTX 3050 Ti laptop GPU specifications leak in full
value.excerpt: Full specifications for Nvidia’s upcoming RTX 3050 Ti mobile graphics card have allegedly shown up in the GPU-Z database ahead of its rumored launch later this month. As reported by Videocardz, somebody anonymously submitted specs for the so-called Nvidia RTX 3050 Ti to the GPU-Z validation database,

value.title: Extreme CEO talks AI, automation, chip shortages
value.excerpt: Extreme CEO Ed Meyercord says its tools that incorporate automation, AI, and ML can help IT catch more problems earlier and head them off before they hit the network.

value.title: Why Most AI Writing Can’t Get Its Facts Straight
value.excerpt: The brute force approach to artificial intelligence writing still works better on fiction than on factual, data-based reporting.

value.title: Intel will invest $3.5 billion in New Mexico chip factory
value.excerpt: Intel said on Sunday that it will spend $3.5 billion on an upgrade for its factory in New Mexico as part of a plan to expand manufacturing.

value.title: How Intel is leveraging AI to drive sales
value.excerpt: Intel is adopting AI internally to bolster its sales and marketing efforts, including through the use of natural language processing.

value.title: Intel CEO seeks $10B subsidy to build a chip factory in Europe
value.excerpt: Intel CEO Pat Gelsinger may be asking for as much as $10 billion in subsidies to build a new foundry in Europe to ease the chip shortage.

value.title: Volkswagen Will Develop In-House Self-Driving Chip to Compete With Tesla, Apple
value.excerpt: Although Tesla’s expensive and strictly in-house developed autonomous driving software has a long way to go to actually achieve self-driving, its German rival Volkswagen is going down the same path to build its own driverless capabilities.

value.title: How the global chip shortage could impact your business
value.excerpt: It will likely take at least 18-24 months to stabilize the supply chain. Until then, many companies will be affected (some more, some less).
